column4: I have two laptops in front of me which are networked via rj4 network cable.. one of them is mine (ubuntu 6.06), the other is my mothers (windows xp).. What's the quickest way to enable me to transfer files?
thank you very much, installing files needed now.
it needs samba from synaptic etc
i've also set the share directory.. What should I do now?
now you can see the shared folder in your winblows machine
to get acces to the winblows files go to: location => network

I seem to be having trouble. My network card in ubuntu is running fine, and the laptop with xp obviousely has it installed. I am currently in system >administration > networking, within the eth0 dialogue. I'm trying to fix the IP settings, since the DHCP option didn't seem to work (nothing there in winblows machine). I've also just tried using manual IP, and having my laptop as the gateway IP of 192.168.1.5, and using that in the same con
yeah, i set it as a static one
yes! norton :D .. ill sort it out
